review: Doctor is good, he explains everything in details and doesn't recommended anything which is not required.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
******* *** **** ****** * **** **** ****** ** *****When I experienced foot drop and visited Dr Rajeev, he diligently took time to explain to me what possibly could have caused it and defined the course of action. Since I started experiencing the pain after a dance-fitness session, we first went forth with an X-Ray to look for possible fractures. Since the X-Ray didn't reveal any abnormalities, we went forth with an MRI to check for possible nerve damage. Meanwhile, I was able to move my fit a little more over the course of 3 days. When the MRI did not reveal any abnormalities either, he asked me if I had a tendency to cross my legs for too long. Turns out I had crossed my legs for too long and pinched the nerve which resulted in the foot drop. After a rest for about 3 weeks and some calcium and vitamin D supplements, I was good as new.
I have rarely come across such amazing doctors who take time to explain to the patient what could be wrong and how they'll go about fixing it. And that too doing it right! Needless to say, this guy is an absolute gem.

We reached out doc twice so far for Knee pain & Shoulder pain. A thorough professional who explains about the test he is gonna conduct. He then gives top 3 reasons why this would happen, causes, and how can we get long term solution (physiotherapy, exercise, life style changes etc) & short term solutions like meds if pain is too much & pills for vitamin deficiency. He also shows you diagram & pictures so that you understand where has what gone wrong. He sends you PDF to read & follow instructions to exercise. All in all haven't met a better Ortho! We recommend him highly!

I visisted the doctor looking at the positive reviews on Practo and had an utterly satisfying experience.
The doctor was crisp in his queries and diagnosis,explained the issue well.** *********** **** ** *********** **** ********* *** didnt jump to start a line of treatment as well.He prescribed some genuine tests and guided on treatment options to be explored based on how the rest results look.
Overall ,he instilled confidence and belief in me that the issue has been identified and can be taken care off
Dr. Rajeev is extremely sweet. He explained my injury calmly and patiently. I Highly recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: He certainly knows what he is doing. He diagnosed my rib fracture instantly and explained me that I don’t need to do anything extra(like x-ray, MRI etc.). He advised me to take rest for 45 days and take extra care of the rib cage for sometime. I am writing this after 60 days and with all ribs intact!!
Good doctor. He treated me with gentle care and gave me sufficient time. Overall experience was good.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have pain in left elbow for more than 5 months and have pain in left toe for around 2 months. Had all the blood tests done as per doctors recommendations.  Doctor prescribed me vit D sachets and calcium tablets. Not satisfied with the treatment. Doctor did not recommend any remedies to heal the pain, like wearing a toe seperator or considering physiotherapy etc (found it online myself later.) Just told me it was bad luck and I need to live with it. **** **** ** **** ****** ** *** *** ** ** ** *** *** **** *******. I am definitely consulting some other doctor.  Getting impatient with this much pain for so long. *** ** *** ***** ****** **** * ***** ****
Very knowledgeable & good doctor, explained the treatment & symptoms well, also gave minimal medicines...very good experience

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,

A very friendly doctor. I had my doubts when visiting a doctor in a new city but I am glad I chose him. He was friendly and explained things in a simple way. Plus he did not advise way too many unnecessary medicines. Overall a great experience

review:
Doctor has done ****** diagnosis of my issue and recommended me vitamins and some lifestyle changes. 
What I liked the most is,  he has explained the issue and how the solution works in the terms I could understand.

The doctor, well explained me the reason of the problem. And also explained the healing will take time to set my expectations correct as there is limited blood suppliy to the problem area.
Instead of only prescribing medicines and giving followup date

*** ** *** **** ******* ** ***** ** *********** ***** *** ******* ** **** ********. Asked for follow up within 3 days and didn’t charged any fee for that. Minimal required tests only and identify issues through symptoms and his experience. Thank you 😊

Doctor is extremely professional and friendly. He examined the knee including its mobility prior to checking reports. He gave a thorough explanation of the injury and the next steps. He also shared the latest findings in the scientific community. The doctor sent us a document with the set of recommended exercises over email. Also, the waiting time was zero.
